Weapon.Name: Echoes of the Forgotten
Weapon.Description: A blade that whispers with the voices of the past, imbued with the essence of lost souls.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The blade cuts through the air, its whispers silencing all who hear it.

Weapon.Name: Shadow Lash
Weapon.Description: A whip formed from condensed shadows, capable of striking fear into the hearts of enemies.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a flick, the shadow extends, enveloping its target in darkness.

Weapon.Name: Glimmering Dagger
Weapon.Description: A dagger that seems to absorb light, only to release it upon striking an enemy.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As the dagger pierces, a burst of light blinds the foe.
